tx_oop_Module_Base::_recordIcon ( $  table,
$  row 
) [protected]

Gets the CSM menu for a record

This method creates an icon of the requested record with a Context Sensitive Menu (CSM).

Parameters:
string The table of the record
array The record's row
Returns:
string The icon with a CSM menu link

tx_oop_Module_Base::_includeWebtoolkitScript ( $  script  )  [protected]

Includes a Webtoolkit script

Available scripts are:

  • base64
  • crc32
  • md5
  • sha1
  • sha256
  • url
  • utf8
